sentence.Network_en: But farmers can also grow criollo or cacao plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是,农场主们也种植criollo或者 trinitario可可豆树.

sentence.Network_en: However, Criollo cocoa accounts for only 10 % of the world crop.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而它的产量只占世界可可豆总产量的10%.

sentence.Network_en: The pure variety of the Criollo tree is found mainly in its native Ecuador and Venezuela.
sentence.Network_cn: 最纯正的克里奥洛可可树主要分布在厄瓜多尔和委内瑞拉.
